resources.string: Opens zoom dialog. Zero zoom value means zooming by width.
Rotates document to the 90 degree clockwise. Long click rotates counterclockwise.
Opens borders crop dialog. Values defined relative to page size. Long click for plus or minus in this dialog changes crop value for 10%. Negative value add additional borders.
1. Open document (zoom by width by default)
2. Select appropriate orientation: portrait or landscape
3. Crop borders, text size will be changed accordingly to changing borders (if zoom by width specified)
Opens page layot dialog. On reading comics or viewing books with images you could select appropriate page layout.
Opens External Dictionary. Choose appropriate Dictionary application in Options.
Tap zones allow user to link different parts of device screen to commonly used commands. There are 3x3 cells where user could define actions for short (top label) and long (bottom label) clicks.

Allow user to export bookmarks (for all books or for current one). Bookmarks are exported to xml file with the name of opened book + [bookmarks.xml or all_bookmarks.xml] suffix. This option is avaliable at Bookmarks screen menu.
